context_bundle.summary: macOS notarization process using notarytool for App Store and distribution outside App Store, including code signing, entitlements, and stapling

onboarding.quick_start: Sign app with Developer ID, submit to Apple via notarytool, staple ticket to app bundle for offline verification
common_patterns: Codesign with hardened runtime and entitlements
Submit via notarytool: xcrun notarytool submit app.zip --keychain-profile profile
Check status: xcrun notarytool info --submission-id ID
Staple ticket: xcrun stapler staple Application.app
Developer ID certificate types: Application, Installer, Service
known_errors: Must sign nested code from innermost to outermost
